overview: When sexy bad boy Roman Todd and his wife visit her younger brother (Troy Accola) in New Hampshire, Roman finds himself battling a sudden attraction for one of Troy's sexy friends (Tobias). Meanwhile, Troy's boyfriend (Billy Santoro) is also lusting for Tobias. When Ashley is unexpectedly called back to work in the city. Roman seizes the opportunity to satisfy his desire for sex with another man. But will he get away with it Starring Roman Todd, Tobias, Troy Accola, and Billy Santoro.
title: The Married Man
